page.title: 02North Radcliffe
page.content: { {North Radcliffe,}in{Bury}Metropolitan District,is part of an old industrial town.The main land uses are{housing, {farming}and some{industry.}Housing is a mixture of old terraced houses and new estates, some are still being built.There are several industries, most of which are small firms.The old, larger firms,have closed.There are quite a few small corner{shops} throughout the area, such as newsagents and grocers.There are two{ {Primary Schools}to serve the local population. Most people travel out of the area to go to work. Several{bus } and{train}services connect Radcliffe to the City of{Manchester}and the towns of Bury and{Bolton}as well as to smaller places nearby.
